channel.title: Story Of My New Pker
channel.description:
[b][size=20pt]Sample Fate - PlayerKiller[/size][/b]
[B]Decided to make a Pker because of all the videos on youtube making the fastest cash,And owning.[/B] [IMG]http://i141.photobucket.com/albums/r74/M0rtion/-6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i141.photobucket.com/albums/r74/M0rtion/RangeLevel.png[/img] -Missed recent levels due to be attacked and screen changing.
Donate/ Comment Please :D.
Add Me If You Wanna Have A Chat :).
Was Planed To Be A Staker, Changed To A Pker!
Will Be Updating Soon.
-Mort [br][hr][b][size=10pt]The Story..[/size][/b] [B]Currently Leveling Range[/b][IMG]http://i141.photobucket.com/albums/r74/M0rtion/On.gif[/img] [B]Currently Leveling Mage [/b][IMG]http://i141.photobucket.com/albums/r74/M0rtion/Off.gif[/img] [B]Currently Leveling Attack [/b][IMG]http://i141.photobucket.com/albums/r74/M0rtion/Off.gif[/img] [b]Currently Leveling Strength [/b][IMG]http://i141.photobucket.com/albums/r74/M0rtion/Off.gif[/img] [b]Currently Leveling Defence [/b][IMG]http://i141.photobucket.com/albums/r74/M0rtion/Off.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i141.photobucket.com/albums/r74/M0rtion/Attack.png[/img]-[IMG]http://i141.photobucket.com/albums/r74/M0rtion/Stregnth.png[/img]-[IMG]http://i141.photobucket.com/albums/r74/M0rtion/Defence.png[/img]-[IMG]http://i141.photobucket.com/albums/r74/M0rtion/Range-21.jpg[/img]-[IMG]http://i141.photobucket.com/albums/r74/M0rtion/Mage-21.jpg[/img]-[IMG]http://i141.photobucket.com/albums/r74/M0rtion/Health-16.jpg[/img]
[B] 1st Of June. [/b]
Logged on after school, Continued ranging chickens to 10 Range. And Went off to Cows..Continuing There Till 20 Range And Logged Off For Now.
[B] 3rd Of June. [/b]
Woke up this morning ate my brecky and had a shower. Logged on and continued killing cows, by now its not so hard leveling as you don't hit so many zeros or ones. Me and a friend are planing to go pking just for a little fun as well as free arrows/runes :). He is basicly the same as me except he has 17 mage :). Were training together now Untill he gets 20 range and i get 25 range, then heading off to varrok. Wish us luck!! ~ Pk Story Added.
After giving up pking i headed for the 'Strong Hold Of Security' And started On the Minatours. I got a few range levels in and 2 Hp levels. Stayed there untill i had to remove my rear from the computer seat and go watch a movie Will continue ranging tommorow. Also gained from 3 - 20 mage on the zammy mage in varrok castle with curses =), great method of training :D. Untill next time my friends, Sample is offline! [IMG]http://i141.photobucket.com/albums/r74/M0rtion/on.gif[/img]
[B] 4th Of June [/B]
Logged on after getting home from school. Ranging, still started to hit 4's off bronze arrows :). Going to get 40 range, then 40 mage, Etc, aiming for 70 range, 70 Mage by the end of this month/2Weeks. Will continue Latter.
[B] 6th Of June [/B] Logged on today after school, got a suspension for, well i don't know. Anyways, logged in attacked one monster and level'd range =P. Got a hp level also, while im killing minitours they randomly drop iron arrows, so i have 200 iron arrows just from killing them. After i got a few levels, i went and brought 2k waters and 1k bodys for 50k. Went off to the Monk Of Zamorak under the stairs in varrok castle, and casted him untill i got 25 mage for Varrok teleport, Got to 26 mage cause it wont level my combat. left varrok to continue range, went to the minatours again. Will continue there untill around 30 range, then i'll log out and go do somthing else =P. Will log back in tommorow if i can get on, parents will take mouse n keybored so i don't play cause i was suspended. i'll easily find em ;). Untill my next logg in, Sample Fate, Offline =).
[br][hr] [b][size=10pt]Player Killing Trips...[/size][/b] [B] Currently Player Killing At Varrok [/b]
[b] 3rd Of June. [/b]
20 Range - 20 Mage-15 Health
Started off walking from varrok east bank to 'The Line' as i call it walked out with my friend steakr, saw a level 13 mager, said to steakr i'll go out n bind him, then range him, when out, clicked bind clicked on the mage dude, he hit me 8, Heal'd then hit me a 7, dead. Im like wtf, walked back to varrok, steakr looted my arrows n chaps so we went back out. No fights that world so we hopped around. Found a world, we started to get teamed, sorted a few out, and got a kill! our first kill. Wasn;t much in it, str ammy and some armour, not much else. Continued hopping till we found one world, we sat up the back on the hills and found one dude, we ranged him, both at the same time, then cast wind bolt, owned him, didn't see that drop steakr got it.
Stayed in that world for a bit picking on two melee people, untill a ranger -mager hybrid come and k.0ed me, and then they killed steakr cause he was ansewing somone on msn, idiot eay. Then gave up and back to training. :)

item.title: Story Of My New Pker
item.dc:creator: @M0rtion M0rtion
item.description:
@M0rtion wrote:

slayer215:

Dude, I got 40 range in one day on my melee pure, and you’ve spent like a week now and you are only 26? I dont mean to be discouraging, but after about 60 you’ll prolly quit.

Well, i have a life apart from runescape, i got school 6 and a half hours aday.
Considering i’v been playing runescape for 2 years, getting to 60 range wont make
me quit, so don’t exspect me how i play.

Read full topic

item.title: Story Of My New Pker
item.dc:creator: @Ca1lum Ca1lum
item.description:
@Ca1lum wrote:

davidude36:

What levels are you hoping to achieve?

I would also like to know and Range or mage stakers arnt the best way to go if your hopeing to win anything above 500k maybe 1mil if your lucky to find another rich Pure/Skater but any one staking big money will wont no armour duel’s… which when they have a dds and u have 1 def will own you. That’s the way i see it but if you see it deffernt just say id like to see why you choose a range skater? maybe so you can pk aswell?

item.title: Story Of My New Pker
item.dc:creator: @M0rtion M0rtion
item.description:
@M0rtion wrote:

[size=20pt]Sample Fate - PlayerKiller[/size]

Decided to make a Pker because of all the videos on youtube making the fastest cash,And owning.


-Missed recent levels due to be attacked and screen changing.

Donate/ Comment Please :D.

Add Me If You Wanna Have A Chat :).

Was Planed To Be A Staker, Changed To A Pker!

Will Be Updating Soon.

-Mort
[br][hr][size=10pt]The Story…[/size]
Currently Leveling Range
Currently Leveling Mage
Currently Leveling Attack
Currently Leveling Strength
Currently Leveling Defence

-----

1st Of June.

Logged on after school, Continued ranging chickens to 10 Range.
And Went off to Cows…Continuing There Till 20 Range And Logged
Off For Now.

3rd Of June.

Woke up this morning ate my brecky and had a shower. Logged on
and continued killing cows, by now its not so hard leveling as you
don’t hit so many zeros or ones. Me and a friend are planing to go
pking just for a little fun as well as free arrows/runes :). He is basicly
the same as me except he has 17 mage :). Were training together now
Untill he gets 20 range and i get 25 range, then heading off to varrok.
Wish us luck!! ~ Pk Story Added.

After giving up pking i headed for the ‘Strong Hold Of Security’ And started
On the Minatours. I got a few range levels in and 2 Hp levels. Stayed there
untill i had to remove my rear from the computer seat and go watch a movie
Will continue ranging tommorow. Also gained from 3 - 20 mage on the zammy
mage in varrok castle with curses =), great method of training :D. Untill
next time my friends, Sample is offline!

4th Of June

Logged on after getting home from school. Ranging, still started to hit 4’s off
bronze arrows :). Going to get 40 range, then 40 mage, Etc, aiming for 70 range,
70 Mage by the end of this month/2Weeks. Will continue Latter.

6th Of June
Logged on today after school, got a suspension for, well i don’t know. Anyways, logged
in attacked one monster and level’d range =P. Got a hp level also, while im killing
minitours they randomly drop iron arrows, so i have 200 iron arrows just from killing
them. After i got a few levels, i went and brought 2k waters and 1k bodys for 50k.
Went off to the Monk Of Zamorak under the stairs in varrok castle, and casted him
untill i got 25 mage for Varrok teleport, Got to 26 mage cause it wont level my combat.
left varrok to continue range, went to the minatours again. Will continue there untill
around 30 range, then i’ll log out and go do somthing else =P. Will log back in tommorow
if i can get on, parents will take mouse n keybored so i don’t play cause i was suspended.
i’ll easily find em ;). Untill my next logg in, Sample Fate, Offline =).

[br][hr]
[size=10pt]Player Killing Trips…[/size]
Currently Player Killing At Varrok

3rd Of June.

20 Range - 20 Mage-15 Health

Started off walking from varrok east bank to ‘The Line’ as i call it
walked out with my friend steakr, saw a level 13 mager, said to
steakr i’ll go out n bind him, then range him, when out, clicked bind
clicked on the mage dude, he hit me 8, Heal’d then hit me a 7, dead.
Im like wtf, walked back to varrok, steakr looted my arrows n chaps
so we went back out. No fights that world so we hopped around.
Found a world, we started to get teamed, sorted a few out, and got
a kill! our first kill. Wasn;t much in it, str ammy and some armour, not
much else. Continued hopping till we found one world, we sat up the
back on the hills and found one dude, we ranged him, both at the same
time, then cast wind bolt, owned him, didn’t see that drop steakr got it.

Stayed in that world for a bit picking on two melee people, untill a ranger
-mager hybrid come and k.0ed me, and then they killed steakr cause
he was ansewing somone on msn, idiot eay. Then gave up and back to
training.

Read full topic
